user_request: see creations saved in the google photos
screen_desc: The screenshot shows the Google Photos app on a smartphone. The main content displays a message indicating that there are no photos available, with a placeholder camera icon. It prompts the user to take a picture, with photos and videos appearing here once available. The bottom navigation bar includes options for "Photos," "Albums," "Assistant," and "Sharing." The top section allows users to search their photos.
history_actions: click on the Photos app located at the upper left.
click on the "Confirm" button located at the bottom of screen.

think.Thought: The current screen in the Google Photos app displays a message indicating there are no photos available. The user has likely saved creations, but they are not appearing on this page. Since no photos are currently shown, the next logical action is to check if the user's photos are located in albums or other sections of the app, which may contain their creations.
Future Action Plan: Click on the 'Albums' option in the bottom navigation bar to check for any saved creations in albums.
